channel.title: W3C Web Cryptography Working Group-relevant MDN issues
channel.description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Web Cryptography Working Group

item.title: [WebCryptoAPI] window.crypto.subtle.generateKey not supported on Safari 15 on iOS {iOS 15 Beta 5}
item.content:encoded:
window.crypto.subtle.generateKey throws an error undefined is not an object (evaluating 'a.subtle()[f]') on Safari 15 on iOS {iOS 15 Beta 5}, while it was working as expected on the previous Beta versions 1 & 2 and all other previous iOS versions.

We've been using SubtleCrypto library in our React-Native app on an iPhone 11 with iOS 15 Beta and ran into this issue.

MDN page report details
  • Query: api.SubtleCrypto.generateKey
  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/SubtleCrypto/generateKey
  • Report started: 2021-08-11T17:49:34.467Z
